title: Fiji, Palau and Tuvalu set to show world leaders climate change impact ahead of COP31

title: Security analyst calls on Mahama to name Zanetor Rawlings as defence minister
desc: Security analyst Dr Ishmael Norman is calling for a historic shift in Ghana’s defence leadership, urging President John Dramani Mahama to appoint a woman as the country’s next Minister of Defence.

title: The Role of the Gut Microbiome in Gastrointestinal Cancer Development
desc: From bacterial genotoxins to immune checkpoint modulation, this comprehensive synthesis reveals how gut microbes shape the molecular and immunologic landscape of gastrointestinal cancers—offering new insight into prevention, diagnosis, and precision treatment strategies.

title: Not just sport and car crashes: debunking 5 myths about traumatic brain injury in NZ
desc: Touching the lives of an average 110 people each day in Aotearoa, traumatic brain injury (TBI) is much more common than any of us would like it to be
